statements: SELECT * FROM SurgicalRobots
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM SurgicalRobots WHERE robot_id = 1
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_records FROM SurgicalRobots ORDER BY robot_name DESC
SELECT * FROM SurgicalRobots WHERE robot_name LIKE 'Da Vinci%'
SELECT * FROM SurgicalRobots WHERE software_updates->>'latest_version' > 'v1.2.0'
SELECT * FROM SurgicalRobots WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT robot_name, software_updates FROM SurgicalRobots WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_records FROM SurgicalRobots WHERE robot_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM SurgicalRobots WHERE robot_name LIKE 'Da Vinci%';
SELECT * FROM SurgicalRobots ORDER BY robot_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, software_update_version FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name FROM robots WHERE robot_id = 3;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_record FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenances WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_record FROM robots WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM robot_maintenances WHERE maintenance_type = 'software update' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_type FROM robots INNER JOIN robot_maintenances ON robots.robot_id = robot_maintenances.robot_id;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_record FROM robots WHERE robot_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY robot_name;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_details FROM robots LEFT JOIN robot_maintenances ON robots.robot_id = robot_maintenances.robot_id AND maintenance_type = 'routine maintenance';
SELECT * FROM robot_profiles;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM robot_profiles;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_records FROM robot_profiles JOIN maintenance_records ON robot_profiles.robot_id = maintenance_records.robot_id;
SELECT robot_name, update_description FROM robot_profiles JOIN software_updates ON robot_profiles.robot_id = software_updates.robot_id;
SELECT robot_name, maintenance_date FROM robot_profiles JOIN maintenance_records ON robot_profiles.robot_id = maintenance_records.robot_id ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, maintenance_records FROM robot_profiles
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%error%'
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, maintenance_description FROM robot_profiles INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON robot_profiles.robot_id = maintenance_records.robot_id
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, maintenance_description, technician_name FROM robot_profiles LEFT JOIN maintenance_records ON robot_profiles.robot_id = maintenance_records.robot_id
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, update_description FROM robot_profiles INNER JOIN software_updates ON robot_profiles.robot_id = software_updates.robot_id
SELECT * FROM robot_profiles;
SELECT name, manufacturer, firmware_version FROM robot_profiles WHERE manufacturer = 'RoboWorks';
SELECT serial_number, manufacturer FROM robot_profiles ORDER BY serial_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, manufacture_date FROM robot_profiles WHERE manufacture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM robot_profiles WHERE manufacturer = 'Robotico' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, serial_number FROM robot_profiles WHERE manufacture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT rp.name, rp.manufacturer, rp.firmware_version, mr.maintenance_date, mr.maintenance_type, mr.maintenance_notes FROM robot_profiles rp JOIN maintenance_records mr ON rp.id = mr.robot_id;
SELECT ue.update_id, ue.update_date, ue.update_details FROM software_updates ue WHERE ue.update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY ue.update_date DESC;
SELECT re.error_id, re.error_date, re.error_description, rp.name AS robot_name, rp.serial_number AS robot_serial FROM robot_errors re JOIN robot_profiles rp ON re.error_id = rp.id;
SELECT * FROM robot_profiles;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type FROM robot_profiles;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM robot_profiles WHERE robot_type = 'Android';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT robot_name, sensor_name FROM robot_profiles INNER JOIN sensors ON robot_profiles.robot_id = sensors.robot_id;
SELECT robot_name, robot_type, manufacturer FROM robot_profiles;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE robot_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT robot_name, update_date, update_description FROM robot_profiles JOIN software_updates ON robot_profiles.robot_id = software_updates.robot_id;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE robot_id = 'd4e5f6' ORDER BY task_name DESC;
